Class GuiController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.ui.GuiController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class GuiController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Main GUI controller for the Tetris game interface. Manages JavaFX UI components, handles rendering of the game board, active brick, ghost piece, and coordinates user input with game logic.

This controller implements multiple design patterns:

  • MVC Pattern: Acts as the View, delegating game logic to GameController
  • Observer Pattern: Uses JavaFX property bindings for automatic UI updates
  • Dependency Injection: Receives InputEventListener through setter injection

Key responsibilities:

  • Rendering the game board, active brick, and ghost piece
  • Handling keyboard input and delegating to game controller
  • Managing game timer and pause/resume functionality
  • Displaying score, level, and notification animations

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the GUI controller when the FXML layout is loaded. Sets up fonts, focus handling, game timer, visual effects, and theme handling.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      location - the location used to resolve relative paths (unused)
      resources - the resources used for localization (unused)

    • initGameView

      public void initGameView(int[][] boardMatrix, ViewData brick)
      Initializes the game view with the board matrix and initial brick. Creates all rectangle arrays for the board, active brick, and ghost piece. Starts the game timer after initialization.
      Parameters:
      boardMatrix - the 2D array representing the game board state
      brick - the initial brick's view data

    • refreshGameBackground

      public void refreshGameBackground(int[][] board)
      Refreshes the game board background with the current board state.
      Parameters:
      board - the 2D array representing the current board state

    • setEventListener

      public void setEventListener(InputEventListener eventListener)
      Sets the input event listener and configures keyboard input handling. Implements dependency injection pattern.
      Parameters:
      eventListener - the listener to handle game input events

    • bindScore

      public void bindScore(javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty integerProperty)
      Binds the score property to the score label using JavaFX property binding. Implements the Observer pattern for automatic UI updates.
      Parameters:
      integerProperty - the score property to bind

    • bindLevel

      public void bindLevel(LevelManager levelManager)
      Binds the level property to the level label.
      Parameters:
      levelManager - the level manager containing the level property

    • bindHighScore

      public void bindHighScore(HighScoreManager highScoreManager)
      Binds the high score property to the high score label.
      Parameters:
      highScoreManager - the high score manager containing the high score property

    • onLevelUp

      public void onLevelUp(int newLevel)
      Called when the player levels up. Shows a notification and updates the timer speed.
      Parameters:
      newLevel - the new level number

    • gameOver

      public void gameOver()
      Handles game over state by stopping the timer, showing the game over panel, and checking for new high scores.

    • newGame

      public void newGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Starts a new game by resetting all state and restarting the timer.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event (may be null if called programmatically)

    • pauseGame

      public void pauseGame(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Handles pause game action by restoring focus to the game panel.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event

    • togglePause

      public void togglePause()
      Toggles the pause state of the game. Pauses or resumes the game timer and shows/hides the pause notification.
